channel.title: Posts on KettleBell and Run Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on KettleBell and Run Blog

item.title: My First 10k Run
item.description: I did it, I ran my first 10k, actually it was 10.85km and it felt awesome!!

item.title: Long Cycle Workout
item.description: As I prepare for longer runs I’ve decided to incorporate long cycle workouts to build my aerobic capacity and endurance.

item.title: November Week3 Run2
item.description: Today is a run day, my plan is to try and hit 6 miles as I prepare for my first 10k race. Woke up at around 5am but didn’t get out of bed until around 6:30am. Started with some stretches that I’d seen on the GoWOD app, but to be honest I can’t do most of them but I put in the effort which is what matters.

item.title: About Me
item.description:
• Born in 1981
  • Father of 3 girls
  • Based in the Bay Area but originally from Kenya
